system.description: The Character can spend a Fate Point to automatically succeed on an Evaluate Test with Intelligence Bonus Degrees of Success as well as gaining some kind of insight into the history of the Evaluated item. This history comes from the character's own broad knowledge, or clues/signs on the item itself, or some other source, at GM discretion.
system.benefit: You can spend a Fate Point to automatically succeed on an Evaluate Test with Intelligence Bonus Degrees of Success as well as gaining some kind of insight into the history of the evaluated item. This history comes from your own broad knowledge, clues/signs on the item itself, or some other source, at GM discretion.

specialAbilities.name: Automatic Evaluation
specialAbilities.description: You can spend a Fate Point to automatically succeed on an Evaluate Test with a number of Degrees of Success equal to your Intelligence Bonus. Additionally, you gain insight into the history of the evaluated item.
